property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: While crossing the bridge, boulders continuously fall and damage the [[party]] if they get hit.

property.name: description
property.value: While crossing the bridge, boulders continuously fall and damage the [[party]] if they get hit.

property.name: description
property.value: The objective of the Desert Board is to unlock the entrance to the pyramid and complete a Physical Challenge.

property.name: description
property.value: Sells [[items]] in his shop.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Lancer]] is trapped on top of a cactus. Pressing this button summons pots that can be thrown at the cactus using the [[Power Croissant]]. [[Susie]], however, throws [[Ralsei]] at the cactus, slightly damaging him but freeing Lancer.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Giant Cactus

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Tenna]] Sphinx, who requests two [[Q]]s from the Quiz Vortexes. After collecting the Qs, the Sphinx challenges the [[party]] with another quiz before detatching his nose and unblocking the western pathway.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Sphinx-Tenna

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can drain the oasis either by drinking from it eight times (which heals the party) or having [[Lancer]] dig out the key in the westernmost area.

property.name: description
property.value: Chases the [[party]] and transports them to the quiz room if it catches up.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Quiz Area

property.name: description
property.value: The reservoir for the oasis. Bringing [[Lancer]] here causes him to leave the board inventory and dig out a [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|key]], clogging up the reservoir in the process.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Oasis Reservoir

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] must push the block along the marked tiles onto the pressure plate to unblock the paths to the south and east.

property.name: description
property.value: Chases the [[party]] and transports them to the quiz room if it catches up.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Cacti

property.name: description
property.value: The pathways leading out of this area become blocked upon entering this area. [[Kris]] must push the blocks along the marked tiles onto the pressure plates to unblock the pathways. Initially, the puzzle cannot be solved due to trees blocking the way, but [[Ralsei]] transforms into a block in order to help Kris finish the puzzle.

property.name: description
property.value: Pushing this pyramid aside reveals a stairwell that allows access into the Secret Mailroom.

property.name: description
property.value: A mailroom, used to store [[Tenna]]'s fan mail. When Tenna discovers it is empty, he cuts the room from the board.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Secret Mailroom

property.name: description
property.value: Contains a doorway leading to the board's Physical Challenge, the [[Cooking Challenge]].

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board#Pyramid

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that there are four [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|keys]] on the board, but only three are required to unlock the pyramid.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that the pyramid is locked by three [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|keys]] and the [[Mooncloud Stone]].

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the oasis with Elnina. Attacks the [[party]] once the oasis is drained.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the oasis with Lanino. Attacks the [[party]] once the oasis is drained.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the bar on the [[TP]] meter in battle and how it increases the rank attained if TP reaches that level at the end.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that [[Kris]] can push the flirtatious cactus in the cacti fields to obtain a [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|key]].

property.name: description
property.value: Comments on the state of the oasis and remarks that there is a [[Mooncloud Stone|secret stone]] inside.

property.name: description
property.value: Waiting until [[Tenna]] mentions a smaller pyramid in the previous room unlocks a pathway to the south of the landing room, which contains [[Rouxls Kaard]] and a smaller pyramid. Tenna cuts Rouxls Kaard from the board out of confusion.

property.name: description
property.value: A Key used to unlock the pyramid. obtaining this key removes the trees to the left.

property.name: page
property.value: Key (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can obtain 10 POINTs from this coin.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can pick up 10 POINTs from this coin.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Lancer]] enters the board inventory after freeing him from the cactus. He can be used to dig up a [[Key (The Legend of Tenna)|key]] and drain the oasis.

property.name: page
property.value: Lancer (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: Allows [[Susie]] to pick up objects and pull up grass for [[POINT]]s

property.name: page
property.value: Power Croissant

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] can push this cactus aside to reveal a key hidden underneath.

property.name: page
property.value: Key (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: A total of 18 POINTs can be obtained in this area.

property.name: description
property.value: A secret key, only obtainable if the player has a completed [[Chapter 3]] SAVE file. It is the last item [[Susie]] pulls up after pulling up bombs from the patches of grass.

property.name: page
property.value: Key (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: An item available in [[Tenna]]'s shop for 250 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Key (The Legend of Tenna)

property.name: description
property.value: An item available in [[Tenna]]'s shop. Initially costs 10 [[POINT]]s, but the price increases the further along the [[party]] is on the board progression.

property.name: page
property.value: TV Dinner

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of two Shadowguys.

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of three Shadowguys.

property.name: description
property.value: Miniboss battle against Lanino and Elnina, triggered by draining the oasis.

property.name: page
property.value: Lanino and Elnina
